dublin_core.dcvalue: In spite of efforts to develop easy to use devices patients may require multiple training sessions to achieve mastery of advanced telehealth devices especially those incorporating web access In geographically distributed projects such repeat training can be costly A software architecture for simultaneous voice conferencing and remote device control over a single telephone line is presented Evaluation of the pilot implementation is favorable
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Architecture for remote training of home telemedicine patients.
